business.headline: InterGlobe Aviation Q3 results: IndiGo operator's net profit falls by 18%Indigo Q3 results: The net profit for the aviation company dropped by 18% to Rs 2,449 crore when compared to Rs 2,998 crore in the same quarter a year ago.

Budget 2025: EV sector pushes for tech investments and smart mobility solutionsExperts anticipate that Budget 2025 would introduce policies that would boost EV sales across the country and help India achieve its goal of reducing carbon emissions by one billion tonnes by 2030.
Sensex, Nifty fall amid volatility; energy and pharma lead lossesThe S&P BSE Sensex shed 329.92 points to close at 76,190.46, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 113.15 points to end at 23,092.20.
Amul cuts milk prices by Re 1 per litre across IndiaThe reduction will only be applicable to 1-litre packs. Previously, in June 2024, Amul had increased milk prices by Rs 2 per litre.

India-US relationship beyond personalities: Fareed Zakaria on Trump 2.0Fareed Zakaria shared his insights on the political shift in the United States and the seismic changes it is expected to bring geopolitically and economically across the world.

Adani Green Energy shares fall as Sri Lanka cancels power purchase dealAdani Green Energy shares fell after the news of Sri Lanka cancelling the power purchase deal to hit the day's low of Rs 1,008, crashing over 6% from the day's high.

Tata Electronics buys 60% controlling stake in Pegatron IndiaTEPL, which is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Tata Sons, said the latest acquisition aligns with Tata Sons' Chairman N Chandrasekaran's vision of investments by the Tata Group in electronics manufacturing.

Why are markets volatile, and should you be worried? 3 things to know Sensex scaled to 76,985.95, reaching the day's high, a jump of over 500 points, but was trading at 76,621.03 as of 1 PM. Nifty has also gone about in the same manner.

Paytm denies ED probe in crypto scam, calls reports 'factually incorrect'Paytm Latest News: Paytm's clarification came after a few media reports claimed that the ED is investigating the fintech firm and other payment gateways in a cryptocurrency scam.

Explained: Why Paytm share price tumbled nearly 9% todayPaytm share price: The shares of the company fell nearly 9% to hit a day's low of Rs 773.90. At 12:18 pm, shares of the fintech company stabilised a bit to trade 2.27% higher at Rs 829.70.
Why did Cyient CEO Karthikeyan Natarajan resign?The resignation of Cyient's CEO Karthikeyan Natarajan was a major reason that led to the sharp decline in the company's share price.

HUL to acquire stake in Minimalist for Rs 2,670 crore; Peak XV bags 10X gainsHUL has acquired a 90.5% stake in Minimalist for Rs 2,670 crore, making it one of the biggest acquisitions in the country's startup ecosystem.

Cyient share price falls 20% to hit 52-week low. What triggered Friday's crash?Cyient stock price: At around 10:21 am, shares of Cyient were down 17.96% to Rs 1,438 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). In early trade, shares of the IT company fell as much as 20% to hit a 52-week low of Rs 1,402.25.

Explained: Why Dr Reddy's share price cracked 6% in early tradeDr Reddy's Laboratories Stock Price: Dr Reddy's shares tumbled up to 6% in early trade and at 9:46 am, they were trading 4.35% lower at Rs 1,233.25 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

Sensex, Nifty open higher tracking Asian markets; energy stocks gainShare Market Today, 24 January 2025: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 204.76 points to 76,725.14 at 9:17 am, while the NSE Nify50 traded 64.15 points higher at 23,269.50.

Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw says manufacturing, services, AI to drive growthAt the World Economic Forum, Minister Ashwini Vaishnav outlined India's economic strategy based on four pillars: public investment in infrastructure, focus on manufacturing and innovation, inclusive growth, and simplification of laws.

EPFO simplifies personal profile updation process. Check steps hereEPF members can update their personal details like name, gender, date of birth, nationality and marital status without the need to submit any documents.

Budget 2025: Startups seeks extended tax holidays, access to affordable creditSeveral experts have shared their Budget 2025 expectations for the startup sector, seeking reforms to help this sector maintain its growth momentum and scale globally.
Sensex, Nifty gain ground as IT, pharma sectors shine; Wipro gains 3%The S&P BSE Sensex gained 115.39 points to close at 76,520.38, while the NSE Nifty50 added 50 points to end at 23,205.35.

Reliance signs Rs 3 lakh crore pact with Maharashtra; to create lakhs of jobsReliance signs pact with Maharashtra: The pact spans across different sectors, with Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis calling it a landmark investment, poised to boost Maharashtra's growth.

entertainment.headline: Singer Chris Brown sues Warner Bros for sexual assault allegations in docuseriesSinger Chris Brown has reportedly sued Warner Bros over sexual assault allegations for a whopping $500 million.

Newtopia trailer: BLACKPINK's Jisoo to headline hilarious romantic zombie dramaThe much-anticipated trailer for Newtopia is out, featuring BLACKPINK's Jisoo and actor Park Jeong-min. The duo navigates a zombie outbreak in this gripping drama based on Han Sang-woon's novel Influenza.

Sweet Dreams movie review: Mithila-Amol's film is a candy that's not sweet enoughReleased-Fri Jan 24, 2025Sweet Dreams movie review: Sweet Dreams could have been a simple romantic film, but it ends up being preachy in an attempt to mildly school the young generation about the difference between dreams and reality. However, Mithila Palkar and Amol Parashar look pretty together.

BB 18 winner Karan Veer Mehra's ex-wife, actor Nidhi Seth gets marriedTwo years after separating from Karanveer Mehra, actress Nidhi Seth remarried her boyfriend Sandiip Kummar. Recently, she shared pictures from her temple wedding.

Watch: BTS' J-hope, Rose, G-Dragon and Taeyang claim the stage at Paris eventBTS member J-hope, Blackpink's Rose, and G-Dragon and Taeyang of BigBang recently marked their presence at a Paris event. J-hope even shared photos from his performance on social media.

When Life Gives You Tangerines: Park Bo-gum, IU's K-drama to premiere on this dateThe much-anticipated K-drama, When Life Gives You Tangerines, starring Park Bo-gum and IU, will premiere on Netflix on March 7. The streaming date was shared alongside the show's first teaser.

Hisaab Barabar review: R Madhavan tries hard to save this middling filmReleased-Fri Jan 24, 2025Hisaab Barabar movie review: R Madhavan's latest, Hisaab Barabar, had the potential to deliver something raw and novel. Instead, the Ashwni Dhir directorial falls into the usual traps of the everyman story. Read our take on the film here.

Paatal Lok 2 ending explained: What's next for Hathi Ram, did he get Rs 2 crore?Paatal Lok 2 continues to captivate audiences with its intricate storyline and profound depiction of Nagaland's socio-political landscape. The series resolves its many mysteries, leaving viewers pondering Inspector Hathi Ram's future. Find out what the season's ending meant and whether there will be a third season of Paatal Lok.

Pics: Rapper Emiway Bantai marries singer-actor SwaalinaRapper Eminem Batai surprised fans as he shared photos from his intimate wedding ceremony with actor and singer Swaalina. The duo worked together in the 2023 music video, Kudi.

Ian Bohen on working with Salman Khan in Marigold, Yellowstone, Teen Wolf, Hollywood dreams Ian Bohen opened up in an exclusive chat about the emotional and dramatic finale season of Yellowstone and credited Teen Wolf for bolstering his self-assurance. He also spoke about Salman Khan, whom he co-starred in Marigold.

Wolf Man Cast Interview: Julia Garner says 'India Hire Me'; Leigh Whannell on directing Bollywood film In an exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, Julia and Leigh spoke about Wolf Man and their experience working on it and interest in Bollywood.

Meet Shashi Kapoor's grandson Zahan Kapoor: Unlike any Kapoor and Sons | Black WarrantZahan Kapoor, grandson of Bollywood icon Shashi Kapoor, is earning praise for his role in the crime thriller Black Warrant. In an exclusive interview with India Today, Zahan expressed gratitude for the overwhelming response and Kapoor legacy.

Watch: Actor Rozlyn Khan accuses Hina Khan of using cancer for publicityRozlyn Khan, a breast cancer survivor, has raised questions about Hina Khan's actions post-mastectomy, suggesting the actor might be using her cancer diagnosis for publicity.
Singer Antara slams Jasleen Royal's Coldplay act: Put music on topSinger Antara Mitra called out Jasleen Royal's opening act with Coldplay. She requested people to 'put music on top'.

Jaideep Ahlawat 'melted like makhan' after Amul's 'Lok-priya snack' honourActor Jaideep Ahlawat shared a gratitude note on social media after Amul gave a shout-out to his character from his latest release, Paatal Lok Season 2. The actor plays the role of Hathi Ram Chaudhary.
The Family Man 3 wrap-up party: Manoj Bajpayee, Samantha pose for picsThe cast of The Family Man 3 has wrapped up shoot for the show. Makers Raj and DK shared photos from their wrap-up party.

Is Friends star David Schwimmer dating a student-activist? Here's the truthDavid Schwimmer, famed for his role in Friends, is in the limelight after being seen with medical student, Eliana Jolkovsky. The duo's outing in Beverly Hills has sparked rumours about their relationship.

TV actor Gurucharan Singh's father shares his health update: He's out of dangerTaarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah actor Gurucharan Singh who was earlier hospitalised, is currently okay. His father shared his health update and said that the actor is out of danger now.

Ed Sheeran seeks recommendations for restaurants in IndiaEd Sheeran is all set to return to his favourite places on Earth -- India. Sharing a post on Instagram, he expressed his excitement for the upcoming "+ - = · x Tour".

Ricky Gervais pays tribute to After Life's dog Brandy: She was a very good girlActor Ricky Gervais has paid a sweet tribute to the dog from his show, After Life, after she died recently. The British comedian and producer shared the tribute on social media.

general news.headline: Expect UK to take strong action: India on 'Emergency' screening obstructionsIndia criticised pro-Khalistani groups obstructing the screening of 'Emergency', starring actor and BJP MP Kangana Ranaut, across the UK, and said freedom of speech and expression cannot be applied selectively.

8 dead in massive blast at ordnance factory in Maharashtra's BhandaraAs a result of the blast, a roof collapsed with 14 people stuck inside. At least two have been rescued so far, according to district officials.

Duct, bathroom mesh: How Saif Ali Khan's attacker got in and out undetectedBased on the police interrogation of the suspect and statements from Saif Ali Khan, his wife Kareena Kapoor and the nurse, Eliyama Philip, India Today put together the sequence of events that happened on January 16.

Jasprit Bumrah among three Indians named in ICC Test Team of Year 2024India fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah was named in the ICC Test Team of the Year following his dream run in the previous year where he scalped 71 wickets.

Kidnapping, not American Dream, took first man from India to USWhile millions of Indians want to reach America to lead a dream life, the first man from India in the US was kidnapped and taken there. The story of Sick Keesar or Sheikh Kesar, an 18th century lascar, makes an interesting read amid Donald Trump's citizenship and deportation plans. Keesar's path also crossed with that of Benjamin Franklin, one of America's Founding Fathers.

10 opposition MPs suspended after uproar at Waqf board parliamentary panel meetTen opposition MPs, including Asaduddin Owaisi and Kalyan Banerjee, were suspended for a day amid uproar during the JPC meeting on the Waqf Amendment Bill 2024. Trinamool Congress's Banerjee criticised the chairman's authoritarian conduct.

Will Donald Trump-Elon Musk bromance last? Fareed Zakaria's takeIn an exclusive interview with India Today News Director Rahul Kanwal, veteran journalist and geopolitical expert Fareed Zakaria shared his views on how long the bromance between Donald Trump and Elon Musk will last.

Fearing family reprisal, Mumbai woman inserts blade in private parts after rapePolice said the 20-year-old woman inserted a surgical blade and stones into her private parts after being raped by an autorickshaw driver in Mumbai.

Djokovic on boos after Australian Open exit: Not sure if they understand meNovak Djokovic feels that people don't understand him after the Serbian was booed for retiring from his semi-final match against Alexander Zverev on Friday, January 24. Djokovic was forced to retire after the first set due to an injury.

Jennifer Aniston's clip resurfaces amid Barack Obama affair buzz: Met him onceThe rumours, which first gained traction after a tabloid story titled 'The Truth About Jen & Barack' was published last year, suggest an alleged affair between Barack Obama and Jennifer Aniston. Despite Aniston's denial, speculation continues online.

Chinese chatter on Trump 2.0: Goodwill gesture or strategic flattery?Trump has been making certain goodwill gestures, from inviting Chinese President Xi Jinping to his inauguration ceremony to providing a high-level reception to China's special representative and Vice President Han Zheng through US Vice President JD Vance.

Smriti Mandhana, Deepti Sharma named in ICC Women's ODI team of the yearOpening batter Smriti Mandhana and all-rounder Deepti Sharma were the only two Indian players to be included in the ICC Women's ODI Team of the Year 2024. Laura Wolvaardt was appointed the captain of the side.

Sky Force review: Akshay Kumar in positive, non-fussy film about emotions, valourReleased-Fri Jan 24, 2025Sky Force movie review: It's always tempting for the makers to overdo India vs Pakistan in a war drama. However, in Sky Force, jingoism is muted and a sense of mutual respect for the soldiers exists. Starring Akshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya, the film looks decent.

How Saif Ali Khan stabbing presses an old pain-point: illegal Bangladeshi settlersThe BSF intercepted 18,000 Bangladeshis between 2018 and 2023 at the borders, yet many more may have slipped through—like the man police say attacked the Bollywood actor

Jannik Sinner sets up Zverev final after beating Ben Shelton in semisAustralian Open: Jannik Sinner made his way through to the final of the hard court major at Melbourne Park after beating USA's Ben Shelton 7-6 (7-2), 6-2, 6-2 to set up a grand finale with World No.2 Alexander Zverev.

Is insisting on handshakes sex harassment? Madras HC gives push to PoSHThe Madras High Court has given a push to the PoSH Act, which is aimed at preventing sexual harassment in the workplace, by ruling "action", and not "intent", was what mattered in such cases. This came as the HC quashed an order by a Chennai labour court against an HCL Technologies employee who was accused of standing behind female subordinates, insisting on handshakes, and asking them about their periods.

Kangana Ranaut takes a dig at Indian politicians as British MP supports EmergencyActor-MP Kangana Ranaut on Friday shared a video on social media where British politician Bob Blackman could be seen defending the screening of her film Emergency in the UK. She also slammed Indian politicians for their silence on the matter.

Annamalai takes on IUML MP's dare, proves non-veg food consumed on sacred hillBJP Tamil Nadu chief Annamalai took on Indian Union Muslim League MP Navas Kani's challenge. He shared evidence to confirm non-vegetarian food was consumed on the sacred Thiruparankundram hill in Madurai.

Citizens of which country? US-born child of H-1B visa holders can be IndianA Donald Trump executive order, now temporarily blocked by a district court, denied US-born children of non-citizens birthright citizenship. Trump has vowed to challenge the court ban. So, what happens to the children born to Indians on temporary visas, like H-1B and L1, in the US if Trump has his way? Whose citizens are they?

FIITJEE coaching centres close in UP, Delhi amid salary disputesFIITJEE coaching institutes across several states have been shut down amid salary disputes among teachers. Parents protested in Noida and Ghaziabad against the sudden closure of centres.

Saif Ali Khan recounts attack to cops: Was with Kareena, suddenly heard screamingIn his statement to police, Saif Ali Khan said he and his wife Kareena Kapoor were in their bedroom when they heard screams from their house help, Eliyama Phillip. They rushed to the room of their son, Jeh, where they found an intruder.

US judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship order: Blatantly unconstitutionalA US federal judge has temporarily blocked President Trump's executive order ending birthright citizenship, calling it "blatantly unconstitutional." The order denies citizenship to children born in the US unless their parents are citizens or legal residents.

Over 1,000 rival party cadres join DMK in protest of anti-Periyar commentsMore than 1,000 Naam Thamizhar Katchi (NTK) members joined the DMK in protest of Seeman's stance on Dravidian ideology and Periyar.

Curious case of 12-year-old Tamil film Madha Gaja Raja outshining Game ChangerDirector Sundar C's Madha Gaja Raja, which was delayed by 12 years, turned out to be a blockbuster. The Vishal-starrer surpassed Ram Charan's Game Changer by a huge margin in Tamil Nadu.

Varun Dhawan's special post for wife Natasha Dalal on fourth wedding anniversaryVarun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal are celebrating their fourth wedding anniversary today. To mark the occasion, the actor shared an adorable social media post with special throwback pictures and made a heartfelt promise to the love of his life.

No Indian in ICC Men's ODI Team of the Year, Asalanka named captainNo Indian is a part of the ICC Men's ODI Team of the Year 2024. Charith Asalanka was named the skipper of the team. Saim Ayub, Shaheen Shah Afridi and Haris Rauf have been picked.

Don't boo Djokovic: Zverev calls out unruly crowd after injured Serb retiresAlexander Zverev urged fans at Rod Laver Arena to respect Novak Djokovic after the Serbian was forced to retire from their Australian Open semi-final due to injury, following an exciting first-set battle that left spectators stunned.

People say I look like Jasprit Bumrah while bowling: Australia's Lily BassingthwaighteAustralia's Under-19 star Lily Bassingthwaighte has revealed that people often compare her action with India speedster Jasprit Bumrah.

Araujo shuts transfer rumours after signing FC Barcelona contract extensionRonald Araujo has ended transfer speculation by signing a six-year extension with Barcelona, securing his future until 2031. The Uruguayan defender remains a cornerstone of Barcelona's defence, solidifying the club's ambitions for long-term stability and success.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".
